attributes.action: Road safety on Cateswel Road B11 3DZ
attributes.additional_details:
We are requesting cameras,speed humps/bumps,rumble strips,ANPR or grass verge parking to name a few solutions.

I have clocked on a regular occurrence vehicles going in excess of 100mph,reported this to the police & local authority but neither will act.
In the space of 12 weeks there have been 3 accidents,2 of which have been total loss insurance claims involving 5 cars. 

We have lived here for 35 years and the road is getting worse.This is a fatal accident waiting to happen.
attributes.background:
Racetrack heaven
A straight line with a 30mph limit but cars can easily exceed 100mph.A busy road with buses,HGVs,motorbikes & cars.
Residential St with shops,pubs & schools either end&MANY children & elderly walkers.We will not accept that someone needs to be injured or die before you take action

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
